title: Support DataParallel for Python list
body_html:
Sometimes I need to give a python list as input to Module. An example is pack_padded_sequence.

batch_size = 128
model = DataParallel(model, device_ids=[0,1])
out = model(txts, txt_lengths)  # [128,..], [128, ..]

.. model.forward(txts, txt_lengths):
pack_padded_sequence(txts, txt_lengths)  # error: 64 != 128
body_text:
Sometimes I need to give a python list as input to Module. An example is pack_padded_sequence.
batch_size = 128
model = DataParallel(model, device_ids=[0,1])
out = model(txts, txt_lengths)  # [128,..], [128, ..]

.. model.forward(txts, txt_lengths):
pack_padded_sequence(txts, txt_lengths)  # error: 64 != 128
body:
Sometimes I need to give a python list as input to Module. An example is `pack_padded_sequence`.

```
batch_size = 128
model = DataParallel(model, device_ids=[0,1])
out = model(txts, txt_lengths)  # [128,..], [128, ..]

.. model.forward(txts, txt_lengths):
pack_padded_sequence(txts, txt_lengths)  # error: 64 != 128
```
